long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to enhance the usage of hup.hu.

The extension allows filtering users' comments and blog posts through the settings panel. Including twitter content.

More features may be added later. Any feedback or PR is appreciated.

Source: https://github.com/mbale/hupper
Contact: hupper@neatlif.io
